Creator: National Association of Victims of Nazism.
Description: 80 x 120 cm. Black and red text with a red and blue border.   Propaganda poster presenting statements from the National Association of Victims of Nazism. Poster is detailed with a red and blue border.
Digitization: Original items were scanned as 600 dpi tiffs on a Zeutschel OS 14000 A0-LS scanner. They were converted to jpegs (sized at 3000 pixels on the long dimension) using Adobe Photoshop CS2 and subsequently uploaded into CONTENTdm.
Publisher: National Association of Victims of Nazism.
Rights Notes: No known copyright. Item is believed to be in public domain due to failure to comply with required formalities.
Source: From: Appel a l'Opinion Publique at aux du Nazisme: Ils ont des droits sur nous
Subject: World War, 1939-1945; War Posters, French
Title: Appel a l'Opinion Publique at aux du Nazisme: Ils ont des droits sur nous
